subject: Training that focuses on unit testing?
msgSnippet: Hi - I am looking for some training for my team in effective unit testing. I have found a few through google searches.  Does anyone have any first hand
messageBody:
Hi -

I am looking for some training for my team in effective unit testing.
I have found a few through google searches. Does anyone have any
first hand knowledge they can share?

I'd like a course that can focus on the benefits of unit testing, how
to use mocks, how to harness the power of TDD, how to sniff out code
smells that unit testing exposes (and what to do about it).

Thanks-
Zak
